mapper.select: select name, category, price, choice_ratio from package join trims_package on trims_package.package_id = package.id where trims_package.trim_id = #{trimId} and trims_package.package_id = #{packageId}
select hashtag.name from package join package_hashtag on package.id = package_hashtag.package_id join hashtag on hashtag.id = package_hashtag.hashtag_id where package.id = #{packageId}
